alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 18 at 11:52PM MST until November 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower Washington County particularly near Black Ridge including the towns of Pintura, Leeds, Toquerville, La Verkin and Hurricane as well as the area near the Beaver Dam Mountains. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For those in the highest threat area, ensure any potential projectiles such as trampolines, outdoor furniture, garbage cans and holiday decorations are properly secured prior to Sunday afternoon to avoid property damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
